properties.entry: select s1.*,s2.NAME,s2.REAL_SKU,s2.IMAGE_URL, (select name from sc_warehouse where id = s1.warehouse_id ) as WAREHOUSE_NAME from sc_warehouse_rma s1 , sc_real_product s2 where 1=1 and s1.real_product_id = s2.id {@ and id = '#id#'} order by create_time desc

INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_rma ( TYPE, QUALITY, QUANTITY, REAL_PRODUCT_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MEMO, WAREHOUSE_ID ) VALUES ( 'in', '{@#quality#}', '{@#quantity#}', '{@#realProductId#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#memo#}', '{@#warehouseId#}' )
